verses.name: Exodus 40:5
verses.text: And thou shalt set the altar of gold for the incense before the ark of the testimony, and put the hanging of the door to the tabernacle.

verses.name: Exodus 40:6
verses.text: And thou shalt set the altar of the burnt offering before the door of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation.

verses.name: Exodus 40:7
verses.text: And thou shalt set the laver between the tent of the congregation and the altar, and shalt put water therein.

verses.name: Exodus 40:8
verses.text: And thou shalt set up the court round about, and hang up the hanging at the court gate.
